00031   
00032   //
00033   // identity
00034   //
00035   template <typename InterfaceType, typename NumericT>
00036   InterfaceType * diff_impl(const InterfaceType * e, op_id<NumericT>, const InterfaceType * diff_var)
00037   {
00038     return e->diff(diff_var); 
00039   }
00040   
00041   //
00042   // exponential
00043   //
00044   template <typename InterfaceType, typename NumericT>
00045   InterfaceType * diff_impl(const InterfaceType * e, op_exp<NumericT>, const InterfaceType * diff_var)
00046   {
00047     return new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( new rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(e->clone(), new op_unary<op_exp<NumericT>, InterfaceType>()),
00048                                            new op_binary<op_mult<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00049                                            e->diff(diff_var)); 
00050   }
00051 
00052   template <typename NumericT, typename InterfaceType>
00053   rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType> exp(rt_constant<NumericT, InterfaceType> const & other)
00054   {
00055     return rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.clone(), new op_unary<op_exp<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>()); 
00056   }

00102   {
00103     return new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( new rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(e->clone(), new op_unary<op_cos<NumericT>, InterfaceType>()),

00105                                            e->diff(diff_var) );
00106   }

00161   //
00162   // cosinus
00163   //
00164   template <typename InterfaceType, typename NumericT>
00165   InterfaceType * diff_impl(const InterfaceType * e, op_cos<NumericT>, const InterfaceType * diff_var)
00166   {
00167     return new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( new rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(e->clone(), new op_unary<op_sin<NumericT>, InterfaceType>()),
00168                                            new op_binary<op_mult<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00169                                            new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( new rt_constant<NumericT, InterfaceType>(-1),
00170                                                                               new op_binary<op_mult<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00171                                                                               e->diff(diff_var) )
00172                                           );
00173   }

00226   //
00227   // tangens
00228   //
00229   template <typename InterfaceType, typename NumericT>
00230   InterfaceType * diff_impl(const InterfaceType * e, op_tan<NumericT>, const InterfaceType * diff_var)
00231   {
00232     return new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( e->diff(diff_var),
00233                                           new op_binary<op_div<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00234                                           new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( new rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(e->clone(),
00235                                                                                                         new op_unary<op_cos<NumericT>, InterfaceType>()),
00236                                                                           new op_binary<op_mult<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00237                                                                           new rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(e->clone(),
00238                                                                                                         new op_unary<op_cos<NumericT>, InterfaceType>()) )
00239                           );
00240   }
00241

00355   //
00356   // square root
00357   //
00358   template <typename InterfaceType, typename NumericT>
00359   InterfaceType * diff_impl(const InterfaceType * e, op_sqrt<NumericT>, const InterfaceType * diff_var)
00360   {
00361       return new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( e->diff(diff_var),
00362                                              new op_binary<op_div<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00363                                              new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( new rt_constant<NumericT>(2),
00364                                                                              new op_binary<op_mult<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00365                                                                              new rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(e->clone(),
00366                                                                                                            new op_unary<op_sqrt<NumericT>, InterfaceType>())
00367                                                                            )
00368                                             );
00369   }
00370

00373   {
00374     return rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.clone(), new op_unary<op_sqrt<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>()); 
00375   }

00422   //
00423   // natural logarithm (aka ln())
00424   //
00425   template <typename InterfaceType, typename NumericT>
00426   InterfaceType * diff_impl(const InterfaceType * e, op_log<NumericT>, const InterfaceType * diff_var)
00427   {
00428     return new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( e->diff(diff_var),
00429                                            new op_binary<op_div<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00430                                            new rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(e->clone())
00431                                          );
00432   }  
00433

00435   rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType> log(rt_constant<NumericT, InterfaceType> const & other)

00438   }

00485   //
00486   // logarithm, base 10
00487   //
00488   
00489   // (log10(f))' = f' / (ln(f) * ln(10))
00490   template <typename InterfaceType, typename NumericT>
00491   InterfaceType * diff_impl(const InterfaceType * e, op_log10<NumericT>, const InterfaceType * diff_var)
00492   {
00493     return new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( e->diff(diff_var),
00494                                            new op_binary<op_div<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00495                                            new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>( new rt_constant<NumericT, InterfaceType>( ::log(10) ),
00496                                                                            new op_binary<op_mult<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>(),
00497                                                                            new rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(e->clone())
00498                                                                          )
00499                                           );
00500   }  
00501 
00502   template <typename NumericT, typename InterfaceType>
00503   rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType> log10(rt_constant<NumericT, InterfaceType> const & other)
00504   {
00505     return rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.clone(), new op_unary<op_log10<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>()); 
00506   }

00509   rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType> log10(rt_variable<InterfaceType> const & other)
00510   {
00511     return rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.clone(), new op_unary<op_log10<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>()); 
00512   }
00513 
00514   template <id_type id>
00515   rt_unary_expr<> log10(ct_variable<id> const & other)
00516   {
00517     return rt_unary_expr<>(new rt_variable<>(id), new op_unary<op_log10<default_numeric_type> >()); 
00518   }

00522   {
00523     return rt_unary_expr<>(new rt_binary_expr<>(other),
00524                            new op_unary<op_log10<default_numeric_type> >()); 
00525   }

00617   //  
00618   // Convenience Function: Laplace operator
00619   //
00620   template <typename InterfaceType>
00621   rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType> laplace(rt_expr<InterfaceType> const & other)
00622   {
00623     return div(grad(other));
00624   }
00625   
00626   template <typename InterfaceType>
00627   rt_unary_expr<InterfaceType> laplace(rt_function_symbol<InterfaceType> const & other)
00628   {
00629     return div(grad(other));
00630   }
